content: Is any one around for lunch at the tree placa
There is a growing group of CGD and CISL staff that meet for lunch on the tree plaza most days from around noon to 1pm. Join us!
I'm planning to have lunch at noon on the tree plaza
I'll be on the tree plaza to have lunch today. I hope someone will be able to join.
I'm in the office today. Feel free to stop by my office #269 until 10am if you want to chat and a coffee or tea.
